thread.title: Hield ejected after hitting Cousins in the groin
thread.title_full: Hield ejected after hitting Cousins in the groin

title: Hield ejected after hitting Cousins in the groin
text:
Hield ejected after hitting Cousins in the groin OUCH. Post to Facebook Hield ejected after hitting Cousins in the groin OUCH.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/buddy-hield-ejected-demarcus-boogie-cousins-groin-punch-kings-pelicans-nba/   Hield ejected after hitting Cousins in the groin Andrew Joseph 10:29 p.m. ET Feb. 12, 2017 
Screenshot (Photo: Twitter) 
Pelicans rookie Buddy Hield's Sunday night game against the Kings lasted just 14 minutes because he, well, went below the belt on DeMarcus Cousins. 
As Hield was running across Cousins' screen in pursuit of Ben McLemore, the Pelicans guard swung his fist and appeared to follow through at Cousins' groin. Buddy Hield was ejected from Pelicans-Kings for this ðŸ˜³ðŸ˜³ðŸ˜³ pic.twitter.com/PXYyVnAKu1 â€” SLAM Magazine (@SLAMonline) February 13, 2017 
Cousins was in obvious pain and immediately turned to the officials to furiously argue his case. He had a very good case. 
The officials reviewed the play and hit Hield with flagrant 2 foul and ejection. After last year's NBA playoffs , the NBA appears to be taking punches (and kicks) to the groin very seriously. 
That's a good thing for everyone involved. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/buddy-hield-ejected-demarcus-boogie-cousins-groin-punch-kings-pelicans-nba/ Most Popular
